description: Everton: Ask BBC Sport your questions
title: Everton: Ask BBC Sport your questions
title_page: Everton: Ask BBC Sport your questions - BBC Sport
maintext:
The 2023-24 Premier League season is edging ever nearer, so what shape are Everton in before the big kick-off on Saturday, 12 August?
We will put your questions to our BBC Radio Merseyside experts for their thoughts on all things Toffees.
